TITLE: FDA authorizes Novavax's updated Covid vaccine targeting JN.1 strain
SUMMARY: Novavax's protein-based shot offers an alternative to the mRNA-based vaccines from Pfizer and Moderna

TITLE: Florida discourages use of mRNA Covid vaccines in older adults
SUMMARY: In updated guidance to health care providers, Florida health officials advise that "non-mRNA Covid-19 vaccines and treatment" should be prioritized

TITLE: What to know about the XEC Covid variant gaining traction in the U.S.
SUMMARY: The strain was first detected in May and has since gained a foothold in parts of Europe

TITLE: How losing your sense of smell affects breathing patterns and mental health
SUMMARY: Anosmia has been previously linked to a wide variety of mental and physical health challenges, ranging from dulled emotions and depression to a shortened lifespan

TITLE: House panel refers Andrew Cuomo for prosecution, alleging 'false statements' on Covid report
SUMMARY: A Cuomo spokesperson called the GOP-led panel’s actions a “farce” and said the ex-New York governor told the truth when he said he couldn’t recall reviewing a state report on Covid-19
